means: 千卡（食物所产生的能量单位）

word_mean: 卡〔路里〕：几种热量单位之一种。意为在特定温度下使一千克水升高1℃所需的热量。化学和生物化学中使用的1卡恰好等于4.184焦耳(joules)，符号为cal.，以往将“小卡”(如上所描述的)与“大卡”区别，后者缩写为“Cal”.，等于1000卡或为一千卡，大卡仅在表示营养时仍沿用，而现在常用小写“c”的卡，在标明食物的能量时意为千卡

sentence.Network_en: Nutritionists say only 33% of our calorie intake should be from fat.
sentence.Network_cn: 营养学家说我们所摄入的卡路里中只应有33％来自脂肪。

sentence.Network_en: Reduced-calorie cheese is a great substitute for cream cheese.
sentence.Network_cn: 低卡路里干酪是奶油干酪的极佳替代品。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French, from Latin calor 'heat' + French suffix -ie (see -y)

encyclopedia.content: calorie(cal,卡路里):其定义为将1克水在1大气压下升高1摄氏度所需要的热量。 根据比热容的定义可以算出1cal的大小： 1cal=1g×4.2×10^3J/(kg・℃)×1℃=4.2J 1kcal=1000cal

entry.def: Calories are units used to measure the energy value of food. People who are on diets try to eat food that does not contain many calories.

example.ex: A glass of wine does have quite a lot of calories.
example.tran: 一杯葡萄酒的热量确实不低。

means.word_mean: 1. unit of heat defined as the quantity of heat required to raise the temperature of 1 gram of water by 1 degree centigrade at atmospheric pressure

auth_sentence.content: The lowest calorie way to get a milk-based coffee.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lowest calorie way to get a milk-based coffee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lowest calorie way to get a milk-based coffee.

auth_sentence.content: Nowadays, this has changed to modest calorie reduction.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nowadays, this has changed to modest calorie reduction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nowadays, this has changed to modest calorie reduction.

auth_sentence.content: That killed the calorie-coded marketing of the restaurant menu.

Sentence.sentence: This means that there could be an extra three billion mouths to feed by the end of the century, a period in which substantial changes are anticipated in the wealth, calorie intake and dietary preferences of people in developing countries across the world.

Energy Usage: Energy is an essential resource across the entire food production cycle, with estimates showing an average of 7-10 calories of input being required in the production of one calorie of food

means.word_mean: 大卡, 千卡(食物所产生的能量单位)

sentences.en: Her diet restricts her to 1500 calories a day.
sentences.cn: 她的规定饮食限制她每天摄入1500大卡热量。

jushi.english: One thin piece of bread has 90 calories.
